definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: The analysis results of the method were compared with those of indicator method.
sentences.chinese: 对该方法与指示剂法分析结果进行了比较。

sentences.english: Bromoc-resol Green and Phenolphthalein-Thymolphthalein were selected as indicators.
sentences.chinese: 选择溴甲酚绿和酚酞一百里酚酞为指示剂。

sentences.english: Presently, Peroxidase is employed as indicator for blanching treatments of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 目前蔬菜的热烫终点以过氧化物酶作为指示剂来确定。

sentences.english: The acidic concentration of the catalyst was titrated by butylamine with the method of adsorption of coloured indicator.
sentences.chinese: 用吸附指示剂正丁胺滴定法测定了催化剂的酸量。

sentences.english: Indicators are indispensable for doing chemical experiments.
sentences.chinese: 做化学实验时，指示剂是必不可少的。

sentences.english: The fuzzy character of colour of the acid base indicator alizarin yellow R is studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酸碱指示剂茜素黄R颜色的模糊特性。

sentences.english: Sterilization of healthcare products chemical indicators.
Of course, there are dangers in using nighttime lights as an indicator for economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 当然，用夜间光源作为经济增长的指示剂也有危险。

sentences.english: Chemical or biological indicators may also be used, but should not take the place of physical measurements.
sentences.chinese: 化学或微生物指示剂可以使用，但不能代替物理检测。

sentences.english: Synthesis of Phthalein Indicators under Microwave Irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 微波作用下酞类指示剂的快速合成。

sentences.english: Amaranth red pigment has security and practical value.
sentences.chinese: 苋菜红指示剂具有安全性和实用价值。

sentences.english: Phenolphthalein or indicator of such a kind is used as colour indicator.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还可加入酚酞或酚酞类酸碱指示剂作显色指示。

sentences.english: Choosing titration indicator is based on jump range of titration ourve.
sentences.chinese: 滴定突跃范围是滴定反应中选择指示剂的依据。

sentences.english: Replace the acidity of orange indicator of instructions to the end.
sentences.chinese: 基橙指示剂取代酸度计来指示终点。
